item.description:
Bratz
Season 2

Poster | Logo | Thumbnail

Kids & Family • 2008 • 2 Seasons • TV-Y7
Voices of: Britt McKillip, Britt Irvin, Dorla Bell, Maryke Hendrikse, Ellie Harvie, Kelly Sheridan, Ashleigh Ball

Description
Set in the fictional city of Stilesville, the show revolves around four adolescents (Cloe, Jade, Sasha, Yasmin) running their own teen magazine, titled "Bratz", while juggling school life at Stiles High School.
